SELECT ui.seq as readerUserId , ui.email , ui.name_first as nameFirst , ui.name_last as nameLast , ui.user_type as userType , li.career_1 as career1 , li.career_2 as career2 , li.career_3 as career3 , lec_fi.file_path AS lecturerImgPath FROM lecturer_info li LEFT OUTER JOIN user_info ui ON li.user_id = ui.seq AND li.delete_yn = 'N' AND ui.delete_yn = 'N' AND ui.user_type = 'DR01' LEFT JOIN file_info lec_fi ON li.file_id = lec_fi.file_id AND lec_fi.file_number = '3' AND lec_fi.delete_yn = 'N'
WHERE li.user_id = #{readerUserId}
